overview: The performance is by renowned organist and Bach specialist Hans-Andre Stamm includes Johann Sebastian Bach Favorites:  •  Toccata and Fugue d minor BWV 565  •  Präludium and Fugue E flat major BWV 552  •  Passacaglia and Fugue c minor BWV 582  •  Various Choral Preludes
title: Bach - Greatest Organ Works Vol. 1
